## RecordClass() function

Returns a [RecordConstructor](./paratype.recordconstructor.md) for the specified record type and data conversion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function RecordClass<Props, Data>(propsType: RecordType<Props>, dataType: Type<Data>, dataToProps: (data: Data) => Props, propsToData: (props: Props) => Data): RecordConstructor<Props, Data>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  propsType | [RecordType](./paratype.recordtype.md)<!-- -->&lt;Props&gt; | A record type that define properties for the returned class |
|  dataType | [Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;Data&gt; | Run-time data type |
|  dataToProps | (data: Data) =&gt; Props | A function that convert data to properties |
|  propsToData | (props: Props) =&gt; Data | A function that convert properties to data |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RecordConstructor](./paratype.recordconstructor.md)<!-- -->&lt;Props, Data&gt;
